protein.specific_function: Inactivates histamine by N-methylation. Plays an important role in degrading histamine and in regulating the airway response to histamine.

reference.reference_text: Yamauchi K, Sekizawa K, Suzuki H, Nakazawa H, Ohkawara Y, Katayose D, Ohtsu H, Tamura G, Shibahara S, Takemura M, et al.: Structure and function of human histamine N-methyltransferase: critical enzyme in histamine metabolism in airway. Am J Physiol. 1994 Sep;267(3 Pt 1):L342-9.
